Judul: ACTIVITY BASED COSTING AND BREAK EVEN POINT ANALYSIS IN X CYBER CAFE
Abstrak: The purpose from this final project is to identification cost, calculation unit cost and Breakeven Point in X Cyber Cafe because at first the owner has not had cost management. Because of that, this research will help the management to make a better decision due to make this business more profitable. To get the unit cost this research using Activity Based Costing method then it will get profit per seat. Then, breakeven point is calculated to know how long this business will get zero profit. According to calculation, Game online has a smaller cost unit per seat, gain more profit, and has faster time to achieve BEP. In contrast, internet activity give a little profit but with higher cost and longer time to get BEP.
